casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Richard Edge (7354)

Borden, Daly and Jacobson, Js.

Argued March 1 decision released March 15, 1989 Nicholas P. Cardwell, for the appellant (defendant). Vincent J. Dooley, deputy assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and Cecelia Wiederhold, deputy assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
